column2: yuqawwilūn lī ukhiff al-hawá lā tabuḥ bih
column3: w kayf w ṭurafay bi-al-hawá ītklm

column2: wamin lubbih ma‘ ghayrah kayf ḥāluh
column3: wamin surrih fī jifanih kayf yaktum

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. raṣad. tawshīḥ raml lābin sahil

column2: lays lī fī al-amr ḥukmun ba‘damā

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. mazmūm. shoghl. tawshīḥ mjzū’ al-khufayf li‘ubid al-raḥman al-fāsī
